Q_DESC:
Create a class called distance with 2 data members feet and inches of type int. Include default constructor (initialize both data members to 0), 1-argument constructor (initialize both feet and inches to the value being passed), 2 argument constructor (The first argument corresponds to feet and the second argument corresponds to inches) and  member functions to display data and to add 2 distances. 

Input and Output Format : 

Refer sample input and output. 
Input:- 
  All spce seperated  Enter distance in feet ,Enter distance in inches ,Enter the value for both feet and inches .
Output:-

Sample Input and Output 1 : 

[All text in bold corresponds to input and the rest corresponds to output] 

Enter Distance 1 feet : 
5
Enter Distance 1 inch : 
4
Enter Distance 2 feet and inches (same value) : 
6
Distance 1 is 5 feet, 4 inches 
Distance 2 is 6 feet, 6 inches 
Distance 3 is 0 feet, 0 inches 
Sum is 11 feet, 10 inches
